overview:
Mr. Harris has served as a Managing Director of Northgate Capital since its inception. Prior to Northgate, Mr. Harris played four years in the National Football League with the San Francisco Forty-Niners. Mr. Harris holds a B.S. in Psychology from Stanford University. While at Stanford University, he excelled athletically and academically, receiving All-Pac 10 athletic and academic honors.

Mr. Harris began his private equity career with New Enterprise Associates and has been an active participant in private company funding as a limited partner and angel investor.
